question: When was Nitte Mahalinga Adyantaya Memorial Institute of Technology (NMAMIT) established?
para_question1: When was Nitte Mahalinga Adyantaya Memorial Institute of Technology founded?
para_question2: What was the date of establishment of Nitte Mahalinga Adyantaya Memorial Institute of Technology (NMAMIT)?
answers: NMAMIT was established in 1986.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: Is NMAMIT recognized by any regulatory body?
para_question1: Are there any regulatory bodies that recognize NMAMIT?
para_question2: Does NMAMIT get recognized by any regulatory body?
answers: Yes, NMAMIT is recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: What is NMAMIT's rank in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2023?
para_question1: What rank does NMAMIT have in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2023?
para_question2: How well does NMAMIT do in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) 2023?
answers: NMAMIT is ranked in the rank band of 101-150 in NIRF 2023 by the Ministry of Education, Government of India. For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: Which university is NMAMIT affiliated with?
para_question1: What university does NMAMIT belong to?
para_question2: With which university is NMAMIT associated?
answers: NMAMIT is a constituent college of Nitte (Deemed to be University), Mangaluru.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: What are the undergraduate (UG) engineering programs offered by NMAMIT?
para_question1: What are the undergraduate engineering courses offered by NMAMIT?
para_question2: Which engineering courses are offered by NMAM Institute of Technology (NMAMIT) for the B.Tech program?
answers: The UG engineering programs offered are: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence & Data Science, Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Computer & Communication Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering, Computer Science (Cyber Security), Computer Science (Full Stack Development), Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electronics (VLSI Design & Technology), Electronics & Communication Engineering (ACT), Information Science & Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, and Robotics & Artificial Intelligence.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: What are the engineering course available for the M.Tech. program at NMAM Institute of Technology (NMAMIT)?
para_question1: What are the graduate engineering courses offered by NMAMIT?
para_question2: Which engineering courses are offered by NMAM Institute of Technology (NMAMIT) for the M.Tech program?
answers: The seven disciplines for M.Tech. program are Construction Technology, Computer Science & Engineering, Cyber Security, Electric Vehicle Technology, Machine Design, Structural Engineering, and VLSI Design & Embedded Systems.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: Does NMAMIT have provisions for research work leading to Ph.D and how does it promote research among its students.?
para_question1: How does NMAMIT encourage research that leads to a PhD, and how does it encourage research among its students?
para_question2: How does NMAMIT promote research among its students, and does it have provisions for research leading to a PhD?
answers: Yes, all the departments at NMAMIT have qualified research guides for students interested in taking up research work leading to Ph.D. and it promotes research among its students by providing qualified research guides, facilities, and opportunities for collaborative projects.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: What is the total area of NMAMIT's campus?
para_question1: What is the entire size of the campus of NMAMIT?
para_question2: How large is the area of NMAMIT's campus?
answers: NMAMIT's campus is spread over 125 acres.For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: What is the nearest airport and railway stations to NMAMIT?
para_question1: Which airports and railway stations are closest to NMAMIT?
para_question2: What are the closest train and airport terminals to NMAMIT?
answers: The nearest airport to NMAMIT is Mangaluru International Airport, which is 45 km away and the nearest railway stations to NMAMIT are Udupi (40 km) and Mangaluru (50 km).For more information, visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/about-nmamit-nitte.php

question: Which highways are closest to NMAMIT?
para_question1: Which roads are near NMAMIT?
para_question2: Are there any highways closest to NMAMIT?
answers: The highways closest to NMAMIT are the ones connecting Karkala and Padubidri, as Nitte is situated between these two towns.For more information, visit https://www.google.co.in/maps/place/N.M.A.M.+Institute+of+Technology/@13.1830012,74.9316861,17.25z/data=!3m1!5s0x3bbcaa27e8fd79af:0x343962e5369a908a!4m6!3m5!1s0x3bbb56415ad85e5b:0x10b77ac6f6afc7fa!8m2!3d13.1830026!4d74.933989!16zL20vMDQxa25k?entry=ttu

question: What is NMAM Institute of Technology's mission, vision and their core values?
